about.text: "TRADITIONAL CZECH RESTAURANT" IN THE CENTER OF PRAGUE, CLOSE FROM
about.text2: RESTAURANT WITH CLASSIC CZECH CUISINE ALSO HAMBURGERS, PASTA, SALADS AND MINUTE DISHES
about.text3: POSSIBILITY OF ORGANIZING WEDDINGS, CORPORATE EVENTS, BIRTHDAY PARTIES OR PARTIES, ON DRAFT: PILSNER URQUELL VELKOPPOVICKÝ KOZEL 11° BLACK GOAT, RADEGAST MIXED DRINKS, WINES AND VARIOUS TYPES OF SOFT DRINKS
about.text4: OTHER SERVICES: WIFI, CARD PAYMENT, FOOD DELIVERY THROUGH BOLT, WOLT, FOODORA, WE LOOK FORWARD TO YOUR VISIT!
